collections.name: attributes

properties.name: attribute_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each attribute.

properties.name: attribute_name
properties.description: Name of the attribute.

collections.description: Contains information about various business attributes.

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each business.

properties.name: active
properties.description: Indicates if the business is currently active.

properties.name: city
properties.description: The city where the business is located.

properties.name: state
properties.description: The state where the business is located.

properties.name: stars
properties.description: The star rating of the business.

properties.name: review_count
properties.description: The count of reviews for the business, categorized into levels.

properties.name: attribute_id
properties.description: Identifier for the attribute, foreign key to the attributes table.

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: attribute_value
properties.description: The value of the attribute for the specific business.

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: category_id
properties.description: Identifier for the category, foreign key to the categories table.

collections.name: business_hours

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: day_id
properties.description: Identifier for the day of the week, foreign key to the days table.

properties.name: opening_time
properties.description: The time the business opens on a specific day.

properties.name: closing_time
properties.description: The time the business closes on a specific day.

collections.description: Contains the opening and closing hours for businesses on different days.

properties.name: category_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each category.

properties.name: category_name
properties.description: Name of the business category.

collections.name: checkins

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: day_id
properties.description: Identifier for the day of the week, foreign key to the days table.

properties.name: label_time_0
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 0 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_1
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 1 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_2
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 2 of the day.

properties.description: Check-in label for hour 7 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_8
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 8 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_9
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 9 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_10
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 10 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_11
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 11 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_12
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 12 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_13
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 13 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_14
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 14 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_15
properties.description: Check-in label for hour 15 of the day.

properties.name: label_time_17

collections.description: Contains check-in data for businesses, categorized by time slots for each day.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: Each label_time_X corresponds to the check-in frequency at hour X of the day.

collections.name: compliments

properties.name: compliment_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each compliment type.

properties.name: compliment_type
properties.description: The type of compliment (e.g., photos, cool, hot).

collections.description: Contains different types of compliments that can be given.

collections.name: days

properties.name: day_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each day of the week.

properties.name: day_of_week
properties.description: The name of the day of the week.

collections.description: Represents the days of the week.

collections.name: elite

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Identifier for the user, foreign key to the users table.

properties.name: year_id
properties.description: The year the user was elite, foreign key to the years table.

collections.description: Links users to the years they were designated as 'elite'.

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business being reviewed, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Identifier for the user who wrote the review, foreign key to the users table.

properties.name: review_stars
properties.description: The star rating given in the review.

properties.name: review_votes_funny
properties.description: Categorized count of 'funny' votes for the review.

properties.name: review_votes_useful
properties.description: Categorized count of 'useful' votes for the review.

properties.name: review_votes_cool
properties.description: Categorized count of 'cool' votes for the review.

properties.name: review_length
properties.description: The length of the review text, categorized as Short, Medium, or Long.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The total number of votes for a review can be calculated by summing the counts from review_votes_funny, review_votes_useful, and review_votes_cool, although these are categorical representations.

collections.name: tips

properties.name: business_id
properties.description: Identifier for the business, foreign key to the business table.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Identifier for the user who left the tip, foreign key to the users table.

properties.name: likes
properties.description: The number of likes the tip received.

properties.name: tip_length
properties.description: The length of the tip, categorized as Short, Medium, or Long.

collections.description: Contains tips left by users for businesses.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for each user.

properties.name: user_yelping_since_year
properties.description: The year the user joined the platform.

properties.name: user_average_stars
properties.description: The average star rating given by the user in their reviews.

properties.name: user_votes_funny
properties.description: Categorized count of 'funny' votes received by the user's reviews in total.

properties.name: user_votes_useful
properties.description: Categorized count of 'useful' votes received by the user's reviews in total.

properties.name: user_votes_cool
properties.description: Categorized count of 'cool' votes received by the user's reviews in total.

properties.name: user_review_count
properties.description: The total number of reviews written by the user, categorized into levels.

properties.name: user_fans
properties.description: The number of fans the user has, categorized into levels.

extra semantic info.commonsense evidence: The total number of votes for a user can be calculated by summing the counts from user_votes_funny, user_votes_useful, and user_votes_cool, although these are categorical representations.

collections.name: users_compliments

properties.name: compliment_id
properties.description: Identifier for the compliment type, foreign key to the compliments table.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Identifier for the user who received the compliment, foreign key to the users table.

properties.name: number_of_compliments
properties.description: The number of times the user has received this compliment, categorized into levels.

collections.description: Links users to the compliments they have received.

properties.name: year_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the year, typically the year itself.

properties.name: actual_year
properties.description: The actual year value.
